name: Caldwell - Buck 15 - Navarette Robusto
additionalNotes: One of 3 new blends in Robert Caldwell’s Lost & Found Buck 15 series, the Buck 15 Cubra spins a Cuban-seed Brazilian wrapper around a Dominican Olor binder and filler leaves from Nicaragua, the Dominican Republic, and Honduras to deliver a super-smooth and dark tasting profile. These lush limited-edition smokes have been aged since 2018 to ensure excellent synergy of its premium leaf components. Notes of oak, roasted nuts, spicy pepper, and more unfold over the course of the Buck 15 Cubra’s slow burn.
